select * from( select MSG_SQ, MSG_CONTENT,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY/MM/DD') < TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS MSG_DATE,
MSG_SENDER, MSG_RECEIVER from message where msg_sender = #{msgSender} and msg_receiver = #{msgReceiver} union select MSG_SQ, MSG_CONTENT,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY/MM/DD') < TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS MSG_DATE,
MSG_SENDER, MSG_RECEIVER from message where msg_sender = #{msgReceiver} and msg_receiver = #{msgSender})

select A.MSG_CONTENT, A.MSG_DATE, CASE WHEN A.MSG_SENDER != 'TEST_ID2' THEN A.MSG_SENDER WHEN A.MSG_RECEIVER != 'TEST_ID2' THEN A.MSG_RECEIVER END AS MEM_ID, B.MEM_PROFILE_NM, B.MEM_PROFILE_PATH from( SELECT * from( select MSG_SQ, MSG_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE,'HH24:MI') MSG_DATE, MSG_SENDER, MSG_RECEIVER from message where msg_sender = 'TEST_ID2' and msg_receiver = #{memId } union select MSG_SQ, MSG_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(MSG_DATE,'HH24:MI') MSG_DATE, MSG_SENDER, MSG_RECEIVER from message where msg_sender = #{memId } and msg_receiver = 'TEST_ID2') ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)A, MEMBER B WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID
